loginSubtitle: Enter your account details to manage your projects
signUpSubtitle: Make managing your applications simple and fun
agreeTip: Please agree to the Privacy Policy and Terms
passwordStrength: Use 8 or more characters with a mix of letters, numbers & symbols
forgetPasswordSubtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you instructions to reset your password
emailValidErrorTip: The email format you entered is incorrect
qrcodeSubtitle: Scan the QR code with your phone to login
qrcodePrompt: Click 'Confirm' after scanning to complete login
codeSubtitle: Enter your phone number to start managing your project
mobileErrortip: The phone number format is incorrect
loginAgainSubTitle: Your login session has expired. Please log in again to continue.
tenantPlaceholder: Please select the organization you want to log in to
tenantNotFound: The selected organization does not exist or is inactive
invalidCredentials: Incorrect username or password, please check and try again
accountDisabled: Your account has been disabled, please contact the organization administrator
tooManyAttempts: Too many failed login attempts, please try again later
sessionManagementDesc: Manage all your login sessions and log out from other devices anytime
revokeSessionConfirmContent: Are you sure you want to log out from device "{device}"?
revokeAllOthersConfirmContent: Are you sure you want to log out from {count} other device(s)? They will immediately lose access.
revokeAllOthersFailed: Failed to log out other devices
noOtherSessionsDesc: You are currently logged in only on this device
